original_text: And when she looked, there was the king standing by the pillar, according to the custom, and the captains and the trumpeters beside the king, and all the people of the land rejoicing and blowing trumpets. And Athaliah tore her clothes and cried, “Treason! Treason!”
korean_text: 보매 왕이 규례대로 단 위에 섰고 장관들과 나팔수가 왕의 곁에 모셔 섰으며 온 백성이 즐거워하여 나팔을 부는지라 아달랴가 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: there was the king standing by the pillar
sentences.korean_translation: 기둥 옆에 서 있는 왕이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the captains and the trumpeters beside the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕 옆에 대장들과 나팔수들이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and all the people of the land rejoicing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅의 모든 백성이 기뻐하며
